trans-unit.target: 已释放此对象。

trans-unit.source: To send an ICMP echo message.
trans-unit.target: 若要发送 ICMP 回显消息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Ping" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Ping" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> that identifies the computer that is the destination for the ICMP echo message.
trans-unit.target: 标识 ICMP 回送消息目标计算机的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the maximum number of milliseconds (after sending the echo message) to wait for the ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指定（发送回送消息后）等待 ICMP 回送答复消息的最大毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains data to be sent with the ICMP echo message and returned in the ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组，它包含要与 ICMP 回送消息一起发送并在 ICMP 回送应答消息中返回的数据。

trans-unit.source: The array cannot contain more than 65,500 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 该数组包含的字节数不能超过 65,500 个字节。

trans-unit.source: An object that is passed to the method invoked when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，此对象将被传递给异步操作完成后所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously attempts to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo message with the specified data buffer to the computer that has the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />, and receive a corresponding ICMP echo reply message from that computer.
trans-unit.target: 尝试用指定的数据缓冲区以异步方式将 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回显消息发送到具有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> 的计算机，并从该计算机接收对应的 ICMP 回显回复消息。

trans-unit.source: This overload allows you to specify a time-out value for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 此重载使您可以为操作指定一个超时值。

trans-unit.source: This method sends the echo message asynchronously and, when the operation completes (successfully or unsuccessfully), returns the status to your application.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将异步发送回送消息，并完成操作后 （成功或失败），返回到你的应用程序的状态。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> method when your application should not block.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>方法时不应阻止你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Each call executes in a separate thread that is automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 在线程池中自动分配一个单独的线程中执行每个调用。

trans-unit.source: When the asynchronous operation completes, it raises the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.PingCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 异步操作完成后，它会发出<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.PingCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: To specify the method that is called when <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> raises the event, you must add a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> delegate to the event before calling <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定时，将调用的方法<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>引发事件，必须添加<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>到之前调用的事件的委托<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The delegate's method receives a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> object that contains a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply> object that describes the result of the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 该委托的方法接收<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs>对象，其中包含<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply>介绍的结果的对象<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> object inherits the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs>对象继承<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the `userToken` object passed into the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含`userToken`对象传递给<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: If your application blocks while waiting for a reply, use the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> methods; these methods are synchronous.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序阻止等待答复时，使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>方法; 这些方法是同步。

trans-unit.source: If the ICMP echo reply message is not received within the time specified by the `timeout` parameter, the ICMP echo fails, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.TimedOut>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的时间内未收到 ICMP 回显回复消息`timeout`参数，则 ICMP 回送失败，和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.TimedOut>。

trans-unit.source: When specifying very small numbers for `timeout`, the Ping reply can be received even if `timeout` milliseconds have elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于非常小的数字时`timeout`，可以收到 Ping 答复即使`timeout`所经历毫秒。

trans-unit.source: This overload uses default settings for packet fragmentation and packet forwarding.
trans-unit.target: 此重载使用的数据包分段和数据包转发的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The packet that contains the ICMP echo message can be fragmented in transit if the total packet size exceeds the maximum packet size that can be transmitted by one of the routing nodes between the local and remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 包含 ICMP 回送消息数据包可以分段在传输过程中如果数据包总大小超过可以传输的最大的数据包大小通过本地和远程计算机之间的路由节点之一。

trans-unit.source: To prevent fragmentation, use one of the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods that takes an `options` parameter, and set the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止有碎片，使用之一<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>采用的方法`options`参数，并设置<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> is `true` and the total packet size exceeds the maximum packet size that can be transmitted by one of the routing nodes between the local and remote computers, the ICMP echo request fails.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>是`true`和数据包总大小超过在本地和远程计算机之间的路由节点之一可以传输的最大的数据包大小，ICMP 回显请求将失败。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is set to <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.PacketTooBig>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>设置为<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.PacketTooBig>。

trans-unit.source: The packet or packet fragments (if fragmented) can be forwarded by routing nodes 128 times before being discarded.
trans-unit.target: 数据包或数据包片段 （如果含有碎片） 可以由路由节点 128 时间之前转发被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: To change this setting, use a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> overload that takes an `options` parameter, and set the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A> property to the desired value.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改此设置，请使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>采用重载`options`参数，并设置<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>属性设置为所需的值。

trans-unit.source: If the packet does not reach its destination after being forwarded the specified number of times, the packet is discarded and the ICMP echo request fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据包不会转发指定的次数后访问其目标，则会丢弃该数据包，并且 ICMP 回送请求失败。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is set to <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.TtlExpired>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>设置为<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.TtlExpired>。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates calling a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> overload, see the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何调用的代码示例<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>重载中，请参阅<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The packet or packet fragments (if fragmented) can be forwarded by routing nodes 128 times before being discarded.
trans-unit.target: 数据包或数据包片段 （如果含有碎片） 可以由路由节点 128 时间之前转发被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: To change this setting, use a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> overload that takes an `options` parameter, and set the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A> property to the desired value.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改此设置，请使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>采用重载`options`参数，并设置<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>属性设置为所需的值。

trans-unit.source: If the packet does not reach its destination after being forwarded the specified number of times, the packet is discarded and the ICMP echo request fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据包不会转发指定的次数后访问其目标，则会丢弃该数据包，并且 ICMP 回送请求失败。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is set to <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.TtlExpired>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>设置为<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.TtlExpired>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> overload, see the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>重载中，请参阅<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping>类概述。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hostNameOrAddress" /> is <see langword="null" /> or is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostNameOrAddress" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 或是一个空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: A call to <see cref="Overload:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync" /> is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync" /> 的调用正在进行中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hostNameOrAddress" /> is an IPv6 address and the local computer is running an operating system earlier than Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostNameOrAddress" /> 是一个 IPv6 地址，并且本地计算机运行的操作系统的版本低于 Windows 2000。

trans-unit.source: An exception was thrown while sending or receiving the ICMP messages.
trans-unit.target: 发送或接收 ICMP 消息时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: See the inner exception for the exact exception that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 请参见内部异常，以确切地了解所引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hostNameOrAddress" /> could not be resolved to a valid IP address.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostNameOrAddress" /> 未能解析为有效的 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: This object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放此对象。

trans-unit.source: The size of <paramref name="buffer" /> exceeds 65500 bytes.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 的大小超过 65500 字节。

trans-unit.source: To send an ICMP echo message.
trans-unit.target: 若要发送 ICMP 回显消息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Ping" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Ping" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> that identifies the computer that is the destination for the ICMP echo message.
trans-unit.target: 标识 ICMP 回送消息目标计算机的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that specifies the maximum number of milliseconds (after sending the echo message) to wait for the ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，指定（发送回送消息后）等待 ICMP 回送答复消息的最大毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains data to be sent with the ICMP echo message and returned in the ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组，它包含要与 ICMP 回送消息一起发送并在 ICMP 回送应答消息中返回的数据。

trans-unit.source: The array cannot contain more than 65,500 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 该数组包含的字节数不能超过 65,500 个字节。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions" /> object used to control fragmentation and Time-to-Live values for the ICMP echo message packet.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions" /> 对象，用于控制 ICMP 回显消息数据包的碎片和生存时间值。

trans-unit.source: An object that is passed to the method invoked when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，此对象将被传递给异步操作完成后所调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously attempts to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo message with the specified data buffer to the computer that has the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />, and receive a corresponding ICMP echo reply message from that computer.
trans-unit.target: 尝试用指定的数据缓冲区以异步方式将 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回显消息发送到具有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> 的计算机，并从该计算机接收对应的 ICMP 回显回复消息。

trans-unit.source: This overload allows you to specify a time-out value for the operation and control fragmentation and Time-to-Live values for the ICMP echo message packet.
trans-unit.target: 此重载允许您指定操作的超时值，并控制 ICMP 回显消息数据包的碎片和生存时间值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> method sends the Echo message asynchronously and, when the operation completes (successfully or unsuccessfully), returns the status to your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>方法将异步发送回送消息，并完成操作后 （成功或失败），返回到你的应用程序的状态。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> method when your application must not block.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>方法时不能阻止你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Each call executes in a separate thread that is automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 在线程池中自动分配一个单独的线程中执行每个调用。

trans-unit.source: When the asynchronous operation completes, it raises the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.PingCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 异步操作完成后，它会发出<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.PingCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: Applications use a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> delegate to specify the method that is called when <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> raises the event.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>委托来指定时，将调用该方法<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: You must add a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> delegate to the event before calling <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你必须添加<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>到之前调用的事件的委托<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The delegate's method receives a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> object that contains a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply> object that describes the result of the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 该委托的方法接收<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs>对象，其中包含<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply>介绍的结果的对象<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> object inherits the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs>对象继承<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the `userToken` object passed into the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含`userToken`对象传递给<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: If your application blocks while waiting for a reply, use the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A> methods; these methods are synchronous.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序阻止等待答复时，使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.Send%2A>方法; 这些方法是同步。

trans-unit.source: If the ICMP echo reply message is not received within the time specified by the `timeout` parameter, the ICMP echo fails, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.TimedOut>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的时间内未收到 ICMP 回显回复消息`timeout`参数，则 ICMP 回送失败，和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.TimedOut>。

trans-unit.source: When specifying very small numbers for `timeout`, the Ping reply can be received even if `timeout` milliseconds have elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于非常小的数字时`timeout`，可以收到 Ping 答复即使`timeout`所经历毫秒。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A> property is `true` and the total packet size exceeds the maximum packet size that can be transmitted by one of the routing nodes between the local and remote computers, the ICMP echo request fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.DontFragment%2A>属性是`true`和数据包总大小超过在本地和远程计算机之间的路由节点之一可以传输的最大的数据包大小，ICMP 回显请求将失败。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is set to <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.PacketTooBig>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>设置为<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.PacketTooBig>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A> property to specify the maximum number of times the ICMP echo message can be forwarded before reaching its destination.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingOptions.Ttl%2A>属性指定在到达其目标之前，可以将其转发 ICMP 回送消息的最大次数。

trans-unit.source: If the packet does not reach its destination after being forwarded the specified number of times, the packet is discarded and the ICMP echo request fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据包不会转发指定的次数后访问其目标，则会丢弃该数据包，并且 ICMP 回送请求失败。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is set to <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.TtlExpired>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>设置为<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.TtlExpired>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is an IPv6 address and the local computer is running an operating system earlier than Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 是一个 IPv6 地址，并且本地计算机运行的操作系统的版本低于 Windows 2000。

trans-unit.source: An exception was thrown while sending or receiving the ICMP messages.
trans-unit.target: 发送或接收 ICMP 消息时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: See the inner exception for the exact exception that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 请参见内部异常，以确切地了解所引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hostNameOrAddress" /> could not be resolved to a valid IP address.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hostNameOrAddress" /> 未能解析为有效的 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: This object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放此对象。

trans-unit.source: The size of <paramref name="buffer" /> exceeds 65500 bytes.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 的大小超过 65500 字节。

trans-unit.source: To send an ICMP echo message.
trans-unit.target: 若要发送 ICMP 回显消息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Ping" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Ping" />

trans-unit.source: Cancels all pending asynchronous requests to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo message and receives a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: 取消所有挂起的发送 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回送消息并接收相应 ICMP 回送答复消息的异步请求。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to terminate any calls to <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> that have not completed.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法来终止到任何调用<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>未完成。

trans-unit.source: Sends an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo message to a computer, and receives a corresponding ICMP echo reply message from that computer as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 将 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回送消息发送到指定的计算机，并从该计算机接收对应的 ICMP 回送答复消息以作为异步操作。

trans-unit.source: An IP address that identifies the computer that is the destination for the ICMP echo message.
trans-unit.target: 一个 IP 地址，它标识作为 ICMP 回送消息目标的计算机。

trans-unit.source: Send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo message with the specified data buffer to the computer that has the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />, and receives a corresponding ICMP echo reply message from that computer as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的数据缓冲区将 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回送消息发送到具有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> 的计算机，并从该计算机接收对应的 ICMP 回送答复消息以作为异步操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 不会阻止此操作。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>> object will complete after the ICMP packet has been sent and the response has been received.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>> 对象已发送 ICMP 数据包，并收到响应后将完成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A call to <see cref="Overload:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendPingAsync" /> is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendPingAsync" /> 的调用正在进行中。

trans-unit.source: An exception was thrown while sending or receiving the ICMP messages.
trans-unit.target: 发送或接收 ICMP 消息时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: See the inner exception for the exact exception that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 请参见内部异常，以确切地了解所引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is not a valid IP address.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 不是有效的 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: This object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放此对象。

trans-unit.source: The computer that is the destination for the ICMP echo message.
trans-unit.target: 作为 ICMP 回送消息的目标的计算机。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for this parameter can be a host name or a string representation of an IP address.
trans-unit.target: 为此参数指定的值可以是主机名，也可以是以字符串形式表示的 IP 地址。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of milliseconds (after sending the echo message) to wait for the ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: （发送回送消息后）等待 ICMP 回送答复消息的最大毫秒数。
